name: unreality
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of not being or seeming to be real: There was a feeling of unreality about the trip, as if I'd stepped into another world for two weeks. There are tensions in the story, especially between reality and unreality. See
unreal
More examplesFewer examplesThere was a terrible unreality about her - as if talking to someone under water.the comic unreality of the playThere's an air of unreality about the situation.
